bibl.title: From Narmouthis (Medinet Madi) to Kellis (Ismant el-Kharab): Manichaean Documents from Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: [Introduction]. - I. The Manichaean Library from Medinet Madi (Narmouthis). - II. The Greek Cologne Mani Codex (Codex Manichaicus Coloniensis). - III. The New Discoveries at Kellis. - IV. The Manichaean Community at Kellis. - V. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: GARDNER I.M.F. and S.N.C. LIEU, From Narmouthis (Medinet Madi) to Kellis (Ismant el-Kharab): Manichaean Documents from Roman Egypt.

[Introduction]. - I. The Manichaean Library from Medinet Madi (Narmouthis). - II. The Greek Cologne Mani Codex (Codex Manichaicus Coloniensis). - III. The New Discoveries at Kellis. - IV. The Manichaean Community at Kellis. - V. Conclusion.
